item.title: Docker Compose之数据库实例
item.author: notes-bin
item.description: Mysql数据库 version: "3.9" services: mysql: container_name: mysql-serv image: mysql:lastest restart: always ports: - 13306:3306 networks: - mysql-serv-subnet environment: MYSQL_DATABASE: owner MYSQL_USER: owner_admin MYSQL_PASSWORD: owner@mysql#123 MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root@123#pwd! TZ: Asia/Shanghai volumes: - ./data:/var/lib/mysql - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro - /etc/timezone:/etc/timezone:ro command: - --character-set-server=utf8 - --collation-server=utf8-bin networks: mysql-serv-subnet: name: mysql-serv-subnet driver: bridge Mariadb 数据库 version: "3.9" services: mariadb: container_name: mariadb-serv image: mariadb:lastest restart: always ports: - 23306:3306
